comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Another Bain/LOC photo of hat-wearing Pancho Villa and "Rodriquez", taken at the same time: "Jerodamor," a Mexican historian, has identified "Rodriquez" as General Panfilo Natera.
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4733201712/]

comment._content: Wystan:  Thank you for making the connection to the other Bain photo taken at the same time.
